website_summaries.verdict: A warm palette with several different finishes in a range of pink, purple, copper, and coral shades.
pros: Includes 18 eyeshadows with matte, shimmer, and glitter finishes
Mattes are very creamy and easy to blend
Duo-chrome shimmers are meant to be used as toppers
cons: Not as pigmented as some of Huda Beauty's other palettes

customer_reviews.title: NOT AUTHENTIC, NOT AS PICTURED
customer_reviews.text: This is a very bad knock off. The colors are not even close. The real pallet is on the right.
customer_reviews.author: broken heart

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this product is fake
customer_reviews.text: I just received my pallet today and IT IS FAKE!!! I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Summer K

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: This is the WORST knockoff of the Desert Dusk palette I have ever seen. The shimmers are not even shimmery. They look shimmery until you swatch them and then they are lackluster. SO disappointed and I hope no one ever buys this palette thinking it is Huda Beauty because it is a sad, sad knockoff and I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Ky

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as what is sold in stores
customer_reviews.text: This product is not what is sold in stores. The colors are not the same and is not the same quality. What I bought at Sephora is on the left of each picture and this product is on the right. I sent back and got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Fake fake fake
customer_reviews.text: This product is fake. We feel like a fool for not doing research before buying it so hopefully this will keep people from buying fake product. Also the package had no protection and the product was damaged. Save your money and buy the real one.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Fake!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love Huda beauty products however this one is a total fake do not purchase!!!! The colors are not the same they crumble easy and not good quality at all.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Therklesen

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors!
customer_reviews.text: The colors of those pallette are very beautiful. However it was almost exactly the same colors of one of my other pallettes...but believe me for $70 it will DEFINITELY be put to good use! Huda is an awesome brand with vibrant colors!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle McElvain

customer_reviews.title: read my review
customer_reviews.text: this is a great beautiful eyeshadow. it is important to know that without eyeshadow glue by 2faced. the sparkle colors wont go on or stay on. i thought when i first bought this it would go on like regular eyeshadow and that i could just use primer. it didnt work. make sure you buy 2faced eyeshadow glue. it makes the glitter stay on for days.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Bethers

customer_reviews.title: I will not buy huda beauty again
customer_reviews.text: Worst eyeshadow I own over $60 I should be able to see the eyeshadow on my eyes and packaging is cheap for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Huber

customer_reviews.title: Way too expensive on here
customer_reviews.text: I paid WAAAAY tooo muchhh . Don’t really use it like at all either. But ya not worth the money atleast not for me 😬
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Romero

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: This product is not real. I went and bought one from Sephora because I thought this package didn't arrive and they don't match at all. I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to recreate cover look.
customer_reviews.text: This pallet is not as easy to work as seen on you tube to recreate the look on the cover. The shimmer for purple did not come out silky smooth, it is actually hard!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriele S.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: The most beautiful pallet I’ve ever purchased definitely a great deal
customer_reviews.author: Khalia

customer_reviews.title: Está página no sirve son unos ladrones
customer_reviews.text: It cost me an arm and a leg and I never got the package to my house
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for Christmas and product was broken when she opened it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: k. macdonald

customer_reviews.title: They were easy to swach and had minimal fall out
customer_reviews.text: I thought these colors were very pigmented and looked very gray on the eyes. They were easy to swach and had minimal fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Fazila Akhter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This lands in my top 10 favorite eye shadow palette
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beatiful
customer_reviews.text: Its such an amazing palette! The colors pop out and it stays amazingly on your skin. I'm literally obsessed with this eyeshadow makeup! The colors blend beautifully together. I so recommend this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but quality is worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Super pigmented! Goes on like butter! Colors are beautiful! Minimal fallout!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Martin

customer_reviews.title: Highly Pigmented
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this palette! Every single color is highly pigmented and blends extremely well. Worth it. Don't give it a second thought, but it!!
customer_reviews.author: Salina

customer_reviews.title: Not real Huda
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews that this was in fact an authentic Huda Desert Dusk I was still skeptical. When I first opened it I noticed the name on the box is not embossed like it is on the original. The front of the palette looks like a sticker that's been put on. And the colors are way off, the shimmers are no where near as sparkle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE COLORS!! Especially for brown or green eyes, thank you <3 Love her too now
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Maranda

customer_reviews.title: I was nervous buying it because some people said it ...
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous buying it because some people said it was a fake but was pleasantly surprised when it arrived it was an original
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the colors and the creaminess of the shadows
customer_reviews.text: This pallet is a real and authentic Huda that I received. I love the colors and the creaminess of the shadows! Great price for an authentic pallet!
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s legit no totally juicy these colors girl are so vivid and will stick I’m so happy I bought it the colors child these juicy ass vivid colors
customer_reviews.author: Vegan Vixen yumyum

product_meta.title: Huda Beauty Desert Dusk Eyeshadow Palette
product_meta.description: What it is: A dynamic eyeshadow palette with 18 shades in four unique textures: one dazzling glitter, eight creamy mattes, six shimmering pearl shades, and three duo-chrome toppers. What it does: Adventure on an exotic Arabian journey with the latest eyeshadow palette by Huda Beauty. This richly toned palette features 18 versatile shades that can be layered in infinite ways to create a vast array of looks with just one palette. Layer different textures to create unique combinations, or add intrigue to smooth matte shades with a duo-chrome topper. From subtle, natural looks to dramatic statements and bold glittering looks, this palette will become your new essential for all your makeup routines. This palette contains: - 8 x Matte Eyeshadows in Blazing, Saffron, Amethyst, Oud, Amber, Eden, Musk, and Desert Sand. - 6 x Pressed Pearl Eyeshadows in Turkish Delight, Angelic, Cashmere, Royal, Nefertiti, and Blood Moon. - 3 x Duo-Chrome Topper Eyeshadows in Retrograde, Twilight, and Celestial. - Pure Glitter Eyeshadow in Cosmo
